mapper.sql: RESP_COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_ID, RESPONSIBILITY_ID, SECURITY_BY_ASSIGN, ORG_LEVEL_ID_BY_ASSIGN, FILTER_BY_ASSIGN, FLAG_RECURSIVE_BY_ASSIGN, SECURITY_MULTI_COY, ORG_LEVEL_ID_MULTI, FILTER_MULTI, FLAG_RECURSIVE_MULTI, FLAG_OTHER_USER_MULTI
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES_S.nextVal from dual
insert into SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES (RESP_COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_ID, RESPONSIBILITY_ID, SECURITY_BY_ASSIGN, ORG_LEVEL_ID_BY_ASSIGN, FILTER_BY_ASSIGN, FLAG_RECURSIVE_BY_ASSIGN, SECURITY_MULTI_COY, ORG_LEVEL_ID_MULTI, FILTER_MULTI, FLAG_RECURSIVE_MULTI, FLAG_OTHER_USER_MULTI ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{responsibilityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{securityByAssign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLevelIdByAssign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{filterByAssign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recursiveByAssignment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{securityMultiCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationLevelIdMultiCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{filterMultyCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recursiveMultiCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{grantAccessToOtherUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

select SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES_S.nextVal from dual

RESP_COMPANY_ID,

SECURITY_BY_ASSIGN,

mapper.update:
update SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES
RESP_COMPANY_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESPONSIBILITY_ID = #{record.responsibilityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECURITY_BY_ASSIGN = #{record.securityByAssign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SECURITY_MULTI_COY = #{record.securityMultiCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_LEVEL_ID_MULTI = #{record.organizationLevelIdMultiCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FILTER_MULTI = #{record.filterMultyCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_RECURSIVE_MULTI = #{record.recursiveMultiCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLAG_OTHER_USER_MULTI = #{record.grantAccessToOtherUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES set RESP_COMPANY_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESPONSIBILITY_ID = #{record.responsibilityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECURITY_BY_ASSIGN = #{record.securityByAssign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_LEVEL_ID_BY_ASSIGN = #{record.orgLevelIdByAssign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILTER_BY_ASSIGN = #{record.filterByAssign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_RECURSIVE_BY_ASSIGN = #{record.recursiveByAssignment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECURITY_MULTI_COY = #{record.securityMultiCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_LEVEL_ID_MULTI = #{record.organizationLevelIdMultiCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILTER_MULTI = #{record.filterMultyCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_RECURSIVE_MULTI = #{record.recursiveMultiCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLAG_OTHER_USER_MULTI = #{record.grantAccessToOtherUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SAM_RESPONSIBILITY_COMPANIES
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESPONSIBILITY_ID = #{responsibilityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ORG_LEVEL_ID_BY_ASSIGN = #{orgLevelIdByAssign,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where RESP_COMPANY_ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
